General.Name: Epiroc AB (publ)
General.Description: Epiroc AB (publ), together with its subsidiaries, develops and produces equipment for use in surface and underground applications in North America, Europe, South America, Africa, the Middle East, Asia, and Australia. It operates in two segments, Equipment & Service, and Tools & Attachments. The Equipment & Service segment provides equipment and solutions for rock drilling, mechanical rock excavation, rock reinforcement, loading and haulage, and ventilation systems, as well as drilling equipment for exploration, and water and energy; and related spare parts and services for the mining and infrastructure industries. This segment also offers solutions for automation, digitalization, and electrification. The Tools & Attachments segment provides rock drilling tools and hydraulic attachments that are used primarily for drilling, deconstruction, recycling, and rock excavation. Epiroc AB (publ) was founded in 1873 and is headquartered in Nacka, Sweden.
